<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage126"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:108PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	FMV
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	=
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(i)&#160;in the case of a share exchange, consolidation, merger or binding share exchange, pursuant to which shares of Common Stock are converted into cash, securities or other property, the average value of all cash and any other consideration (as determined by the Board of Directors) paid or payable per share of Common Stock or (ii)&#160;in the case of any other Public Acquirer Change of Control, the average of the Closing Sale Prices of shares of Common Stock for the five consecutive Trading Days prior to the Trading Day immediately preceding the effective date of the Public Acquirer Change of Control
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:108PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	SP(o)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	=
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the average of the Closing Sale Prices of the Public Acquirer Common Stock for the five consecutive Trading Days prior to the Trading Day immediately preceding the effective date of the Public Acquirer Change of Control
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;If the Corporation elects to adjust the conversion rate and conversion obligation in connection with a public acquirer change of control, holders of Series B Preferred Stock will not have the right to require us to repurchase their notes pursuant to Section 11 or to convert at an adjusted conversion rate as described in Section 7(l). For the purposes of this subsection&#160;(n) &#8220;Public Acquirer Change of Control&#8221; means any event constituting a Fundamental Change that would otherwise obligate the Corporation to increase the Conversion Rate pursuant to Section&#160;7(l) in which the acquirer has a class of Common Stock traded on a U.S. national securities exchange or quoted on the Nasdaq Stock Market or which will be so traded or quoted when issued or exchanged in connection with a Fundamental Change (&#8220;Public Acquirer Common Stock&#8221;). If an acquirer does not itself have a class of Common Stock satisfying the foregoing requirement, it will be deemed to have &#8220;Public Acquirer Common Stock&#8221; if either (1)&#160;a direct or indirect majority-owned subsidiary of the acquirer or (2)&#160;a corporation that directly or indirectly owns at least a majority of the acquirer, has a class of Common Stock satisfying the foregoing requirement; and in each case such person has taken all necessary action to ensure that upon conversion of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock into such class of Common Stock, such class of Common Stock will not be treated as &#8220;restricted securities,&#8221; and will otherwise be eligible for immediate sale in the public market by non-affiliates of the Corporation absent a registration statement, and then all references to Public Acquirer Common Stock shall refer to such class of Common Stock. Majority-owned for purposes of this provision means having &#8220;beneficial ownership&#8221; (as defined in Rule&#160;13d-3 under the Exchange Act) of more than 50% of the total voting power of all shares of the respective entity&#8217;s Common Stock that are entitled to vote generally in the election of directors.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Upon a Public Acquirer Change of Control, the Corporation may elect to permit holders to convert their shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock (subject to the satisfaction by the holders of the conditions to conversion in Section&#160;6 and the exercise by the holders of their right to convert in accordance with this Section&#160;7 within the period specified by the Corporation in the Fundamental Change Notice, but regardless of whether or not such holders convert, such holders will not be entitled to the increased Conversion Rate pursuant to Section&#160;7(l).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	We must give notice to all holders of shares of Series B Preferred Stock at least 15 trading days prior to the anticipated effective date of such a Fundamental Change and whether we will elect to increase the conversion rate as described in Section 7(l) hereof or adjust the conversion rate as described in section 7(m) hereof. We must also give notice to all holders of shares of Series B Preferred Stock that such a fundamental change as become effective.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Mandatory Conversion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. (a) At any time on or after November 20, 2009, the Corporation shall have the right, at its option, to cause the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock, in whole but not in part, to be automatically converted into that number of whole shares of Common Stock for each share of Series&#160;B Preferred Share equal to the prevailing Conversion Rate, with any resulting fractional share of Common Stock to be settled in accordance with Section&#160;6(d). The Corporation may exercise its right to cause a
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	17
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage127"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	mandatory conversion pursuant to this Section&#160;8(a) only if the Closing Sale Price of the shares of Common Stock equals or exceeds 150% of the Conversion Price then in effect for at least 20&#160;Trading Days in any consecutive 30&#8209;Trading Day period, including the last Trading Day of such 30&#8209;Trading Day period, ending on the Trading Day prior to the Corporation&#8217;s issuance of a press release announcing the mandatory conversion as described in Section&#160;8(b).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;To exercise the mandatory conversion right described in Section&#160;8(a), the Corporation must issue a press release for publication through a public medium that is customary for such press releases prior to the opening of business on the first Trading Day following any date on which the conditions described in Section&#160;8(a) are met, announcing such a mandatory conversion. The Corporation shall also give notice by mail or by publication (with subsequent prompt notice by mail) to the holders of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock (not more than four Business Days after the date of the press release) of the mandatory conversion announcing the Corporation&#8217;s intention to convert the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock. The conversion date will be a date selected by the Corporation (the &#8220;Mandatory Conversion Date&#8221;) and will be not less than 15&#160;days or more than 30&#160;days after the date on which the Corporation issues the press release described in this Section&#160;8(b).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;In addition to any information required by applicable law or regulation, the press release and notice of a mandatory conversion described in Section&#160;8(b) shall state, as appropriate: (i)&#160;the Mandatory Conversion Date; (ii)&#160;the number of shares of Common Stock to be issued upon conversion of each share of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock; (iii)&#160;the number of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock to be converted; and (iv)&#160;that dividends on the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock to be converted will cease to accrue on and after the Mandatory Conversion Date.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;On and after the Mandatory Conversion Date, dividends will cease to accrue on the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock called for a mandatory conversion pursuant to Section&#160;8(a) and all rights of holders of such shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock will terminate except for the right to receive the whole shares of Common Stock issuable upon conversion thereof and cash, in lieu of any fractional share of Common Stock in accordance with Section&#160;6(d). The dividend payment with respect to the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock called for a mandatory conversion pursuant to Section&#160;8(a) on a date during the period between the close of business on any Record Date for the payment of dividends to the close of business on the corresponding Dividend Payment Date will be payable on such Dividend Payment Date to the record holder of such share on such Record Date if such shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock have been converted after such Record Date and prior to such Dividend Payment Date. Except as provided in the immediately preceding sentence with respect to a mandatory conversion pursuant to Section&#160;8(a), no payment or adjustment will be made upon conversion of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock for accumulated and unpaid dividends or for dividends with respect to the shares of Common Stock issued upon such conversion.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Corporation may not authorize, issue a press release or give notice of any mandatory conversion pursuant to Section&#160;8(b) unless, prior to giving the notice of the mandatory conversion, all accumulated and unpaid dividends on the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock for Dividend Periods ending on or prior to the date of such mandatory conversion notice shall have been paid in cash, shares of Common Stock, or any combination thereof.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;In addition to the mandatory conversion right described in Section&#160;8(a), if there are less than 7,500 shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock Outstanding, the Corporation shall have the right, at any time on or after November 20, 2009, at its option, to cause the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock to be automatically converted into that number of whole shares of Common Stock equal to the then prevailing
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	18
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage128"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Conversion Rate. The provisions of clauses&#160;(b), (c), (d) and (e) of this Section&#160;8 shall apply to any such mandatory conversion.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Effect of Reclassification, Consolidation, Merger or Sale on Conversion Privilege
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. (a) If the Corporation (i)&#160;reclassifies or changes its Common Stock (other than changes in par value or resulting from a subdivision or combination), (ii)&#160;consolidates or combines with or merges into or is a party to a binding share exchange with any Person or (iii)&#160;sells or conveys to another Person all or substantially all of the Corporation&#8217;s property and assets, and as a result of which the holders of shares of Common Stock receive (or the shares of Common Stock are converted into) stock, other securities or other property or assets (including cash or any combination thereof) with respect to or in exchange for shares of Common Stock, then, following such reclassification, change, consolidation, combination, merger, share exchange, sale or conveyance, each share of Series&#160;B Preferred Share then Outstanding will, without the consent of any holder of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock, be convertible at any time at the option of the holder thereof only into the kind and amount of shares of stock, other securities, other property or assets (including cash or any combination thereof) receivable, upon such reclassification, change, consolidation, combination, merger, share exchange, sale or conveyance by a holder of the number of shares of Common Stock into which such shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock were convertible immediately prior thereto, after giving effect to any adjustment event. In such a case, any increase in the Conversion Rate by shares of Additional Common Stock as described in Section&#160;7(l) will not be payable in shares of Common Stock, but will represent a right to the aggregate amount of securities, cash and other property into which the shares of Additional Common Stock would convert upon such reclassification, change, consolidation, combination, merger, share exchange, sale or conveyance. Notwithstanding the first sentence of this Section&#160;9(a), if the Corporation elects to adjust the Conversion Rate and the Corporation&#8217;s conversion obligation as described in Section&#160;7(m), the provisions described in that Section will apply instead of the provisions described in the first sentence of this Section&#160;9(a).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Corporation shall cause notice of the application of this Section&#160;9 to be delivered to each holder of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock at the address of such holder as it appears in the Corporation&#8217;s stock register within 15&#160;days after the occurrence of any of the events specified in Section&#160;9(a) and shall issue a press release containing such information and publish such information on its web site. Failure to deliver such notice shall not affect the legality or validity of any conversion right pursuant to this Section&#160;9.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The above provisions of this Section&#160;9 shall similarly apply to successive reclassifications, changes, consolidations, mergers, combinations, sales and conveyances, and the provisions of Section&#160;7 shall apply to any shares of Capital Stock received by the holders of shares of Common Stock in any such reclassification, change, consolidation, merger, combination, sale or conveyance; provided that if this Section&#160;9 applies to any event or occurrence, Section&#160;7 shall not apply to such event or occurrence.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	10.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Rights Issued in Respect of Common Stock Issued Upon Conversion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Each share of Common Stock issued upon conversion of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock shall be entitled to receive the appropriate number of shares of Common Stock or preferred stock purchase rights, as the case may be, including without limitation, the rights under the Rights Plan (collectively, the &#8220;Rights&#8221;), if any, that shares of Common Stock are entitled to receive and the certificates representing the shares of Common Stock issued upon such conversion shall bear such legends, if any, in each case as may be provided by the terms of any shareholder rights agreement adopted by the Corporation, as the same may be amended from time to time (in each case, a &#8220;Rights Plan&#8221;). Provided that such Rights Plan requires that each share of Common Stock issued upon conversion of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock at any time prior to the distribution of separate certificates representing the Rights be entitled to receive such Rights, then, notwithstanding anything else to the contrary in the Series&#160;B Terms, there shall not be any adjustment to the conversion privilege or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	19
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage129"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Conversion Rate as a result of the issuance of Rights, but an adjustment to the Conversion Rate shall be made pursuant to Section&#160;7(c) upon the separation of the Rights from the shares of Common Stock.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	11.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Purchase Option of the Holder upon Certain Fundamental Changes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. (a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Repurchase Right
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. (i) If a Fundamental Change occurs, each holder of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock shall have the right, at the option of the holder thereof, but subject to Section&#160;11(j), to require the Corporation to purchase, and upon exercise of such right the Corporation shall purchase all or a portion of such holder&#8217;s shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock on the date (the &#8220;Fundamental Change Purchase Date&#8221;) that is 45 days after the date of the Fundamental Change Notice for an amount equal to the sum of 100% of the Liquidation Preference of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock to be repurchased, plus any accrued and unpaid dividends to, but excluding, the Fundamental Change Purchase Date (&#8220;Fundamental Change Purchase Price&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Notwithstanding the foregoing provisions of Section&#160;11(a), holders of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock will not have the right to require the Corporation to repurchase the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock (and the Corporation will not be required to deliver a Fundamental Change Notice) if (A)&#160;the Closing Sale Price per share of Common Stock for any five Trading Days within the period of 10&#160;consecutive Trading Days ending immediately before the later of the Fundamental Change or the public announcement of the Fundamental Change, equals or exceeds 105% of the Conversion Price of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock in effect immediately before the Fundamental Change or the public announcement of the Fundamental Change, (B)&#160;at least 90% of the consideration, excluding cash payments for fractional shares and cash payments made in respect of dissenters&#8217; appraisal rights, in the transaction or transactions constituting the Fundamental Change consists of shares of capital stock traded on a U.S. national securities exchange or quoted on the Nasdaq Stock Market or which will be so traded or quoted when issued or exchanged in connection with a Fundamental Change (&#8220;Publicly Traded Securities&#8221;) and as a result of this transaction or transactions the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock become convertible into such Publicly Traded Securities, (C)&#160;with respect to clause (iv) in the definition of Fundamental Change in subsection (b), the transaction is effected solely to change the Corporation&#8217;s jurisdiction of incorporation and results in a reclassification, conversion or exchange of outstanding shares of Common Stock solely into shares of Common Stock of the surviving Person.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;For the purposes of the above clause the term &#8220;capital stock&#8221; of any Person means any and all shares (including ordinary shares or American depositary shares), interests, participations or other equivalents however designated of corporate stock or other equity participations, including partnership interests, whether general or limited, of such Person and any rights (other than debt securities convertible or exchangeable into an equity interest), warrants or options to acquire an equity interest in such Person.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(iv)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Corporation will not be required to repurchase any shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock upon the occurrence of a Fundamental Change if a third party makes an offer to purchase the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock in the manner, at the price, at the times and otherwise in compliance with the requirements described in this Section 11 and purchases all shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock validly tendered and not withdrawn.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(v)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Under Delaware law, the Corporation may repurchase shares of the Series B Preferred Stock only if the Corporation&#8217;s total assets would be greater than the sum of its total liabilities plus, unless the Certificate of Incorporation of the Corporation permits otherwise, the amount needed, if the Corporation were to be dissolved at the time of the repurchase, to
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	20
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage130"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	satisfy the preferential rights, upon dissolution, of shareholders whose preferential rights on dissolution are superior to the holders of shares of the Series B Preferred Stock.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Definition of Fundamental Change
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. A &#8220;Fundamental Change&#8221; shall be deemed to have occurred at such time after the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock are originally issued that any of the following events shall occur:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;any &#8220;person&#8221; or &#8220;group&#8221; (as such terms are used in Sections&#160;13(d) or 14(d) of the Exchange Act), is or becomes the &#8220;beneficial owner&#8221; (as defined in Rules&#160;13d-3 and 13d-5 under the Exchange Act), except that a person shall be deemed to have acquired &#8220;beneficial ownership&#8221; of all securities that such person or group has the right to acquire, whether such right is exercisable immediately or only after the passage of time), directly or indirectly, of 50% or more of the total voting power of all classes of the Corporation&#8217;s Capital Stock then outstanding and normally entitled to vote in the election of directors without regard to the occurrence of any contingency (the &#8220;Voting Stock&#8221;);
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;during any consecutive two-year period, individuals who at the beginning of such period constituted the Board of Directors of the Corporation (together with any new directors whose election to such Board of Directors of the Corporation, or whose nomination for election by the shareholders of the Corporation, was approved by a vote of at least 66&#160;2/3% of the directors of the Corporation then still in office who were either directors at the beginning of such period or whose election or nomination for election was previously so approved) cease for any reason to constitute a majority of the Board of Directors of the Corporation then in office;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the termination of trading of shares of Common Stock, which shall be deemed to have occurred at any time after the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock are originally issued that shares of Common Stock (or other Common Stock into which the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock are then convertible) are not approved for trading or quoted on the Nasdaq Stock Market or any other U.S. securities exchange or another established over-the counter trading market in the United States; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(iv)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the Corporation consolidates with, or merges with or into, another Person or another Person merges with or into the Corporation or the Corporation sells, assigns, transfers, leases (other than pursuant to an operating lease entered into in the ordinary course of business), conveys or otherwise disposes of all or substantially all of its assets and the assets of the Subsidiaries of the Corporation, taken as a whole, to any Person and, in the case of any such merger or consolidation, the Corporation&#8217;s Capital Stock that is outstanding immediately prior to such transaction and which represents 100% of the aggregate voting power of the Voting Stock are changed into or exchanged for cash, securities or property, unless pursuant to such transaction such Capital Stock is changed into or exchanged for, in addition to any other consideration, securities of the surviving Person that represent, immediately after such transaction, at least a majority of the aggregate voting power of the Voting Stock of the surviving Person.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Fundamental Change Notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. At least 15 Trading Days prior to the anticipated effective date of a Fundamental Change and again within 15&#160;days after the occurrence of a Fundamental Change, the Corporation shall mail a written notice of the Fundamental Change (the &#8220;Fundamental Change Notice&#8221;) by first-class mail to each holder of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock at the address shown for each holder on
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	21
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage131"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	the Corporation&#8217;s stock register (and to beneficial owners as required by applicable law). The Fundamental Change Notice shall include a form of Fundamental Change Purchase Notice to be completed by the holder of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock and shall state, if applicable:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;briefly, the events causing the Fundamental Change, the nature of the Fundamental Change and the date of such Fundamental Change and the repurchase right arising as a result of the Fundamental Change;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;whether the Fundamental Change falls under clause (iv) of the definition of Fundamental Change, in which case the conversion adjustments described in Section 7(l) hereof will be applicable;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the date by which the Fundamental Change Purchase Notice pursuant to this Section&#160;11 must be given;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(iv)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the Fundamental Change Purchase Date;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(v)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the Fundamental Change Purchase Price per share of Series&#160;B Preferred Share;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(vi)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the name and address of the Transfer Agent;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(vii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the then existing Conversion Rate and any adjustments thereto;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(viii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;that shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock as to which a Fundamental Change Purchase Notice has been given may only be converted into shares of Common Stock to the extent that the Fundamental Change Purchase Notice has been withdrawn in accordance with the Series&#160;B Terms;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(ix)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;that the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock must be delivered to the Transfer Agent together with a Fundamental Change Purchase Notice to collect payment;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(x)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;that the Fundamental Change Purchase Price for any share of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock as to which a Fundamental Change Purchase Notice has been duly given will be paid promptly following the later of the Fundamental Change Purchase Date and the time of delivery of such share of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock as described in clause&#160;(viii) above;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(xi)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;briefly, the procedures the holder of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock must follow to exercise rights under this Section&#160;11 and the procedures for withdrawing a Fundamental Change Purchase Notice; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(xii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the CUSIP number(s) of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Simultaneously with providing such notices, the Corporation will issue a press release and publish the information regarding such Fundamental Change through a public medium customary for such press releases.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Fundamental Change Purchase Notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. A holder of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock may exercise its rights specified in Section&#160;11(a) upon delivery of a written notice (a &#8220;Fundamental Change Purchase Notice&#8221;) to the Transfer Agent at any time prior to the close of business on the Business Day
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	22
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage132"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	immediately before the Fundamental Change Purchase Date, together with book-entry transfer or delivery of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock with respect to which the right is being exercised, stating:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(A)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;if shares of certificated Series&#160;B Preferred Stock have been issued, the certificate numbers (or, if the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock are not certificated, the Fundamental Change Purchase Notice must comply with appropriate Depository procedures);
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(B)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;number of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock to be repurchased; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(C)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;that the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock are to be repurchased by the Corporation pursuant to the applicable provisions of this Section&#160;12 and, if applicable, of the certificate evidencing shares of the Series&#160;B Preferred Stock.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Withdrawal of Fundamental Change Purchase Notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, a holder of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock may withdraw a Fundamental Change Purchase Notice in whole or in part at any time prior to the close of business on the Business Day before the Fundamental Change Purchase Date by delivery of a written notice of withdrawal to the Transfer Agent specifying:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the number of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock being withdrawn;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;if shares of certificated Series&#160;B Preferred Stock have been issued, the certificate numbers of the withdrawn shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock (or, if the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock are not certificated, the withdrawal notice must comply with appropriate Depositary procedures); and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;the number of shares, if any, of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock which remain subject to the original Fundamental Change Purchase Notice.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	If a Fundamental Change Purchase Notice is delivered to the Transfer Agent and subsequently withdrawn by the holder of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock pursuant to this Section&#160;12, then the Corporation will not be obligated to repurchase the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock specified as withdrawn in the written notice of withdrawal.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Effect of Fundamental Change Purchase Notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Upon receipt by the Transfer Agent of the Fundamental Change Purchase Notice, the holder of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock in respect of which such Fundamental Change Purchase Notice was given shall (unless such Fundamental Change Purchase Notice is withdrawn as specified above) thereafter be entitled to receive the Fundamental Change Purchase Price with respect to such shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock, subject to book-entry transfer or delivery of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock, together with any necessary endorsements to the Transfer Agent. Such Fundamental Change Purchase Price shall be paid to such holder promptly on the later of (a)&#160;the Fundamental Change Purchase Date with respect to such shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock or (b)&#160;the time of delivery of such shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock to the Transfer Agent by the holder thereof in the manner required by this Section&#160;11. Shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock in respect of which a Fundamental Change Purchase Notice has been given by the holder thereof may not be converted into shares of Common Stock on or after the date of the delivery of such Fundamental Change Purchase Notice unless such Fundamental Change Purchase Notice has first been validly withdrawn as specified in Section&#160;11(e) above.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	23
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage133"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Payment of Fundamental Change Purchase Price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The Corporation may, at its option, elect to pay the Fundamental Change Purchase Price in cash or, in shares of Common Stock valued at a discount of 5% from the Market Price of the shares of Common Stock, or any combination thereof; provided that the Corporation may pay such Fundamental Change Purchase Price in shares of Common Stock only if such shares are registered under the Securities Act and are eligible for immediate sale in the public market by non-affiliates of the Corporation.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	On the Fundamental Change Purchase Date set forth in the Fundamental Change Notice mailed to holders pursuant to Section&#160;11(c), the Corporation will, to the extent lawful, (i)&#160;repurchase all shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock properly tendered and (ii)&#160;deposit with the Transfer Agent an amount equal to the Fundamental Change Purchase Price of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock so tendered. The Transfer Agent shall promptly mail or deliver to each holder of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock so tendered the applicable payment for those shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock, and the Transfer Agent shall promptly countersign and mail or deliver to each holder certificates representing, or cause to be transferred by book-entry to each holder, new shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock equal to any portion of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock not tendered for repurchase by the Corporation, if any.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	If the Paying Agent holds money or shares of Common Stock sufficient to pay the Fundamental Change Purchase Price, then, on and after the Fundamental Change Purchase Date (A)&#160;the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock repurchased by the Corporation will cease to be Outstanding, (B)&#160;such shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock will cease to accumulate dividends, and (C)&#160;all other rights of the holder in respect of such shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock will terminate, other than the right to receive the Fundamental Change Purchase Price, whether or not book-entry transfer of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock has been made or the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock have been delivered to the Paying Agent.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(h)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Repayment to the Corporation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. The Paying Agent shall return to the Corporation any cash and shares of Common Stock that remain unclaimed for two years, subject to applicable unclaimed property law, together with interest, if any, thereon held by the Paying Agent for the payment of the Fundamental Change Purchase Price; provided, however, that to the extent that the aggregate amount of cash deposited by the Corporation pursuant to this Section&#160;11 exceeds the aggregate Fundamental Change Purchase Price of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock or portions thereof which the Corporation is obligated to purchase as of the Fundamental Change Purchase Date, then on the Business Day following the Fundamental Change Purchase Date, the Paying Agent shall return any such excess to the Corporation. Thereafter, any holder entitled to payment must look to the Corporation for payment as general creditors, unless an applicable abandoned property law designates another Person.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exchange Act Compliance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. The Corporation will comply with any applicable provisions of Rule&#160;13e-4 and any other tender offer rules under the Exchange Act in the event of an offer by the Corporation to repurchase the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock upon a Fundamental Change. The Corporation will file a Schedule TO or any other schedule required in connection with any offer by the Corporation to repurchase the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock upon a Fundamental Change.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(j)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The right of the holders of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock described in this Section&#160;11 will be subject to the Corporation&#8217;s and its Subsidiaries&#8217; obligations to repay or repurchase all of their debt obligations or shares of preferred stock required to be repurchased or repaid in connection with a
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	24
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage134"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	transaction or event that constitutes a Fundamental Change and to any contractual restrictions contained in the Corporation&#8217;s or any of its Subsidiaries&#8217; indebtedness. When the Corporation shall have satisfied these obligations or these obligations are no longer applicable to the Corporation or any of its Subsidiaries and, subject to the legal availability of funds for this purpose, the Corporation shall then repurchase all shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock tendered for purchase by the Corporation upon a Fundamental Change pursuant to this Section
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	12.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Voting Rights
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The holders of record of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock shall not have any voting rights except as hereinafter provided in this Section&#160;12.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;So long as any shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock remain Outstanding, the Corporation will not, without the consent of the holders of at least two-thirds of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock Outstanding at the time, voting separately as a class with all other series of Preferred Stock upon which like voting rights have been conferred and are exercisable, issue or increase the authorized amount of any class or series of shares ranking senior to the shares of Outstanding Series&#160;B Preferred Stock as to dividends or upon liquidation. In addition, the Corporation will not amend, alter or repeal provisions of the Corporation&#8217;s certificate of incorporation, including the Series&#160;B Terms relating to the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock, whether by merger, consolidation or otherwise, so as to adversely amend, alter or affect any power, preference or special right of the shares of Outstanding Series&#160;B Preferred Stock or the holders thereof without the affirmative vote of not less than two-thirds of the issued and Outstanding shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock; provided, however, that any increase in the amount of the authorized shares of Common Stock or authorized shares of Preferred Stock or the creation and issuance of other series of Common Stock or Preferred Stock ranking on a parity with or junior to the Series&#160;B Preferred Stock as to dividends and upon liquidation will not be deemed to adversely affect such powers, preference or special rights.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;If at any time (1)&#160;dividends on any shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock or any other class or series of Parity Shares shall be in arrears for Dividend Periods, whether or not consecutive, containing in the aggregate a number of days equivalent to six calendar quarters or (2)&#160;the Corporation shall have failed to pay the Fundamental Change Purchase Price when due, then, in each case, the holders of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock (voting separately as a class with all other series of Parity Shares upon which like voting rights have been conferred and are exercisable) will be entitled to elect two directors, in addition to those directors on the Board of Directors at such time (each, a &#8220;Series&#160;B Preferred Stock Director&#8221;) at the next annual meeting of shareholders (or at a special meeting of the Corporation&#8217;s shareholders called for such purpose, whichever is earlier) and each subsequent meeting until the Fundamental Change Purchase Price or all dividends accumulated on the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock have been fully paid or set aside for payment. The term of office of such Series&#160;B Preferred Stock Directors will terminate immediately upon the termination of the right of the holders of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock to vote for directors. Each holder of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock will have one vote for each share of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock held. At any time after voting power to elect directors shall have become vested and be continuing in the holders of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock pursuant to this Section&#160;12(c), or if a vacancy shall exist in the office of any Series&#160;B Preferred Stock Director, the Board of Directors may, and upon written request of the holders of record of at least twenty-five percent (25%) of the shares of Outstanding Series&#160;B Preferred Stock addressed to the Chairman of the Board of Directors of the Corporation shall, call a special meeting of the holders of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock (voting separately as a class with all other series of Parity Shares upon which like voting rights have been conferred and are exercisable) for the purpose of electing the Series&#160;B Preferred Stock Director that such holders are entitled to elect. At any meeting held for the purpose of electing a Series&#160;B Preferred Stock Director, the presence in person or by proxy of the
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	25
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage135"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	holders of at least a majority of the shares of Outstanding Series&#160;B Preferred Stock shall be required to constitute a quorum of such Series&#160;B Preferred Stock. Any vacancy occurring in the office of a Series&#160;B Preferred Stock Director may be filled by the remaining Series&#160;B Preferred Stock Director unless and until such vacancy shall be filled by the holders of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock and all other Parity Shares having like voting rights, as provided above. The Series&#160;B Preferred Stock Directors shall agree, prior to their election to office, to resign upon any termination of the right of the holders of shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock and Parity Shares having like voting rights to vote as a class for Series&#160;B Preferred Stock Directors as herein provided, and upon such termination, the Series&#160;B Preferred Stock Directors then in office shall forthwith resign.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	13.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Transfer Agent and Registrar
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. The duly appointed Transfer Agent (the &#8220;Transfer Agent&#8221;) and Registrar (the &#8220;Registrar&#8221;) for the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock shall be Continental Stock Transfer and Trust Company, New York, New York. The Corporation may, in its sole discretion, remove the Transfer Agent in accordance with the agreement between the Corporation and the Transfer Agent; provided that the Corporation shall appoint a successor transfer agent who shall accept such appointment prior to the effectiveness of such removal.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	14.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Currency
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. All shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock shall be denominated in U.S. currency, and all payments and distributions thereon or with respect thereto shall be made in U.S. currency. All references herein to &#8220;$&#8221; or &#8220;dollars&#8221; refer to U.S. currency.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	15.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Form
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. (a) The shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock shall be issued in the form of one or more permanent global shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock (each, a &#8220;share of Global Preferred Stock&#8221;) in definitive, fully registered form with the global legend (the &#8220;Global Stock Legend&#8221;) and, until such time as otherwise determined by the Corporation and the Registrar, the restricted stock legend (the &#8220;Restricted Stock Legend&#8221;), each as set forth on the form of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock Certificate attached hereto as Exhibit A, which is hereby incorporated in and expressly made a part of the Series&#160;B Terms. The share of Global Preferred Stock may have notations, legends or endorsements required by law, stock exchange rules, agreements to which the Corporation is subject, if any, or usage (provided that any such notation, legend or endorsement is in a form acceptable to the Corporation). The share of Global Preferred Stock shall be deposited on behalf of the holders of shares of the Series&#160;B Preferred Stock represented thereby with the Registrar, at its New York office, as custodian for the Depositary, and registered in the name of the Depositary or a nominee of the Depositary, duly executed by the Corporation and countersigned and registered by the Registrar as hereinafter provided. The aggregate number of shares represented by each share of Global Preferred Stock may from time to time be increased or decreased by adjustments made on the records of the Registrar and the Depositary or its nominee as hereinafter provided. This Section&#160;15 shall apply only to a share of Global Preferred Stock deposited with or on behalf of the Depositary. The Corporation shall execute and the Registrar shall, in accordance with this Section&#160;15, countersign and deliver initially one or more shares of Global Preferred Stock that (i)&#160;shall be registered in the name of Cede &amp; Co. or other nominee of the Depositary and (ii)&#160;shall be delivered by the Registrar to Cede &amp; Co. or pursuant to instructions received from Cede &amp; Co. or held by the Registrar as custodian for the Depositary pursuant to an agreement between the Depositary and the Registrar. Members of, or participants in, the Depositary (&#8220;Agent Members&#8221;) shall have no rights under the Series&#160;B Terms, with respect to any share of Global Preferred Stock held on their behalf by the Depositary or by the Registrar as the custodian of the Depositary, or under such share of Global Preferred Stock, and the Depositary may be treated by the Corporation, the Registrar and any agent of the Corporation or the Registrar as the absolute owner of such share of Global Preferred Stock for all purposes whatsoever. Notwithstanding the foregoing, nothing herein shall prevent the Corporation, the Registrar or any agent of the Corporation or the Registrar from giving effect to any written certification, proxy or other authorization furnished by the Depositary or impair, as between the Depositary and its Agent Members, the operation of
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	26
</FONT>
</DIV>

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage136"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	customary practices of the Depositary governing the exercise of the rights of a holder of a beneficial interest in any shares of Global Preferred Stock. Owners of beneficial interests in shares of Global Preferred Stock shall not be entitled to receive physical delivery of certificated shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock, unless (x)&#160;DTC is unwilling or unable to continue as Depositary for the shares of Global Preferred Stock and the Corporation does not appoint a qualified replacement for DTC within 90&#160;days, (y)&#160;DTC ceases to be a &#8220;clearing agency&#8221; registered under the Exchange Act or (z)&#160;the Corporation decides to discontinue the use of book-entry transfer through DTC (or any successor Depositary). In any such case, the shares of Global Preferred Stock shall be exchanged in whole for certificated shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock in registered form, with the same terms and of an equal aggregate Liquidation Preference, and bearing a Restricted Stock Legend (unless the Corporation determines otherwise in accordance with applicable law). Certificated shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock shall be registered in the name or names of the Person or Person specified by DTC in a written instrument to the Registrar.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	An Officer shall sign the share of Global Preferred Stock for the Corporation, in accordance with the Corporation&#8217;s bylaws and applicable law, by manual or facsimile signature.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;If an Officer whose signature is on a share of Global Preferred Stock no longer holds that office at the time the Registrar countersigns the share of Global Preferred Stock, the share of Global Preferred Stock shall be valid nevertheless.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;A shares of Global Preferred Stock shall not be valid until an authorized signatory of the Registrar manually countersigns such share of Global Preferred Stock. The signature shall be conclusive evidence that such share of Global Preferred Stock has been authenticated under the Series&#160;B Terms. Each share of Global Preferred Stock shall be dated the date of its authentication.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	16.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Registration; Transfer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. (a) The shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock and the shares of Common Stock issuable upon conversion of the Series&#160;B Preferred Stock have not been registered under the Securities Act and may not be offered, resold, pledged or otherwise transferred prior to the date that is two years after the later of the last date of issuance of the shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock and the last date on which the Corporation or any Affiliate thereof was the owner of such shares of Series&#160;B Preferred Stock or shares of Common Stock, other than (i)&#160;to the Corporation or any Affiliate or Subsidiary thereof, (ii)&#160;to &#8220;qualified institutional buyers&#8221; pursuant to and in compliance with Rule&#160;144A under the Securities Act (&#8220;Rule&#160;144A&#8221;), (iii)&#160;pursuant to and in compliance with Rule&#160;903 or 904 of Regulation&#160;S under the Securities Act (&#8220;Regulation S&#8221;), (iv)&#160;pursuant to an exemption from the registration requirements of the Securities Act, including Rule&#160;144 under the Securities Act (&#8220;Rule&#160;144&#8221;), if available, or (v)&#160;pursuant to an effective registration statement under the Securities Act, in each case, in accordance with any applicable securities laws of any state of the United States.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary herein, so long as a share of Global Preferred Stock remains outstanding and is held by or on behalf of the Depositary, transfers of a share of Global Preferred Stock, in whole or in part, or of any beneficial interest therein, shall only be made in accordance with this Section&#160;16; provided, however, that a beneficial interest in a share of Global Preferred Stock bearing the Restricted Stock Legend may be transferred to a Person who takes delivery thereof in the form of a beneficial interest in a different share of Global Preferred Stock not bearing the Restricted Stock Legend in accordance with the transfer restrictions set forth in the Restricted Stock Legend and the provisions set forth in Section&#160;16(c)(ii).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
